## Voice.getAudioDevices() method

Get audio device information from the native layer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAudioDevices(): Promise<{
        audioDevices: AudioDevice[];
        selectedDevice: AudioDevice | null;
    }>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;{ audioDevices: [AudioDevice](./twilio-voice-react-native.audiodevice_class.md)<!-- -->\[\]; selectedDevice: [AudioDevice](./twilio-voice-react-native.audiodevice_class.md) \| null; }&gt;

A `Promise` that - Resolves with a list of the native device's audio devices and the currently selected device.
